pr_title: Actions: Speed up expire snapshots action

timeline.message: Do not use all_data_files table in ExpireSnapshotsAction.
Deduplicate manifests before reading in expire action and broadcast IO.

timeline.bodyText: The Datafile Equivalent of this is named SparkDataFile, although it isn't written as a Bean as uses a "wrap(Row row)" method fo applying. I think this naming more sense to me, just wanted to note.

timeline.bodyText: As we discussed a bit, it may make sense to log a warning here for users with "adaptive query on" that they will lose the ability to control the parallelism of the manifest read stage with that parameter enabled. I'm a little torn on whether that is too technical a detail or whether it will trip up lots of real users ...
